,8.06,20.8,0.6405029755432097,0.21580102414045355,['Georgia Amendment 1, Local Option Homestead Property Tax Exemption Amendment (2024)', 'Georgia Amendment 2, Creation of Tax Court Amendment (2024)', 'Georgia Referendum A, Personal Property Tax Exemption Increase Measure (2024)']","['“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to authorize the General Assembly to provide by general law for a state-wide homestead exemption that serves to limit increases in the assessed value of homesteads, but which any county, consolidated government, municipality, or local school system may opt out of upon the completion of certain procedures?[4]”', '“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to provide for the Georgia Tax Court to be vested with the judicial power of the state and to have venue,  judges, and jurisdiction concurrent with superior courts?[2]”', '“Do you approve the Act that increases an exemption from property tax for all tangible personal property from $7,500.00 to $20,000.00?[2]”']","# Ballot for Burke County, Georgia
## Georgia 10th Superior Court District Attorney Augusta Circuit
## Georgia Amendment 1, Local Option Homestead Property Tax Exemption Amendment (2024)

“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to authorize the General Assembly to provide by general law for a state-wide homestead exemption that serves to limit increases in the assessed value of homesteads, but which any county, consolidated government, municipality, or local school system may opt out of upon the completion of certain procedures?[4]”
## Georgia Amendment 2, Creation of Tax Court Amendment (2024)

“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to provide for the Georgia Tax Court to be vested with the judicial power of the state and to have venue,  judges, and jurisdiction concurrent with superior courts?[2]”
## Georgia Referendum A, Personal Property Tax Exemption Increase Measure (2024)
“Do you approve the Act that increases an exemption from property tax for all tangible personal property from $7,500.00 to $20,000.00?[2]”

## Georgia Amendment 1, Local Option Homestead Property Tax Exemption Amendment (2024)

“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to authorize the General Assembly to provide by general law for a state-wide homestead exemption that serves to limit increases in the assessed value of homesteads, but which any county, consolidated government, municipality, or local school system may opt out of upon the completion of certain procedures?[4]”
## Georgia Amendment 2, Creation of Tax Court Amendment (2024)

“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to provide for the Georgia Tax Court to be vested with the judicial power of the state and to have venue,  judges, and jurisdiction concurrent with superior courts?[2]”
## Georgia Referendum A, Personal Property Tax Exemption Increase Measure (2024)
“Do you approve the Act that increases an exemption from property tax for all tangible personal property from $7,500.00 to $20,000.00?[2]”

## Ogeechee River Soil and Water Conservation District Board Screven County Seat
## Georgia Amendment 1, Local Option Homestead Property Tax Exemption Amendment (2024)

“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to authorize the General Assembly to provide by general law for a state-wide homestead exemption that serves to limit increases in the assessed value of homesteads, but which any county, consolidated government, municipality, or local school system may opt out of upon the completion of certain procedures?[4]”
## Georgia Amendment 2, Creation of Tax Court Amendment (2024)

“Shall the Constitution of Georgia be amended so as to provide for the Georgia Tax Court to be vested with the judicial power of the state and to have venue,  judges, and jurisdiction concurrent with superior courts?[2]”
## Georgia Referendum A, Personal Property Tax Exemption Increase Measure (2024)
“Do you approve the Act that increases an exemption from property tax for all tangible personal property from $7,500.00 to $20,000.00?[2]”
